data.title: Haaga-Helia University of Applied Sciences
data.meta_description: Haaga-Helia is a strongly business orientated university of applied sciences in Finland with several bachelor and master degree programs. Through education, research and development, HH
data.text:
Haaga-Helia is a strongly business orientated university of applied sciences in Finland with several bachelor and master degree programs. Through education, research and development, HH prepares professionals for business and services. The unit of Experience and Wellness Economy in Haaga-Helia focuses on the education of tourism, hotel and restaurant management and sports and leisure management. Haaga-Helia consists of five campuses and has approximately 10 700 students.

Haaga-Helia is recognised and highly valued as an international partner. In the research and development, one of our core competences is experiental service innovations. Haaga-Helia’s Service School concentrates on service and customer experience development in various contexts and industries.

SusCop Project team in Haaga-Helia:
